name: Project Giana
blurb: Jump, dash and twirl through a dual dreamscape and warp it at will. For PC.

rewards.reward: No Reward
A DRM-free digital copy of the finished game for PC.

The previous reward tier plus three backer-exclusive alternate costumes for Giana: A Backer Giana in Kickstarter and Black Forest Games colors, an Angel/Devil Giana, and a Retro/Metal Giana to mirror the Soundtrack!
The previous reward tier plus a digital download version of the original soundtrack and access to an early sneak peek version of the game\u2019s first six levels.

NEW: CUSTOM BACKGROUND EDITOR - the previous reward tier plus a program that allows you to import any picture from your PC into your copy of the game, replacing the paintings in all indoor castle levels with the images of your choice.

NEW: DIGITAL PACK - A DRM-free copy of the game, a digital version of the soundtrack, a digital version of the artbook and the early level sneak peek. This new reward tier is exclusive: it isn\u2019t automatically included in later tiers and doesn\u2019t contain previous tiers as normal. If the next tier refers to a previous tier, it will skip this tier.
The previous reward tier plus a digital download version of the art book, a physical copy of the original soundtrack and a Giana Backer pin, with free shipping world-wide!
The previous reward tier plus a mousepad featuring the cheeky Pikomi artwork visible in the preview on the main page. Free shipping worldwide.

NEW: JEWEL EDITION - A jewel case containing the game, the soundtrack and the art book on DVD, plus a backer pin in addition to the contents of the DIGITAL PACK. (Free shipping worldwide.) This new reward tier is exclusive: it isn\u2019t automatically included in later tiers and doesn\u2019t contain previous tiers as normal. If the next tier refers to a previous tier, it will skip this tier.
The previous (non-exclusive) reward tier plus a basic Giana backer T-shirt in one of the gem colors: blue, yellow or red \u2013 your choice! Free shipping worldwide as usual.

NEW: GAMER PACK - A special, limited reward: a wireless F710 Logitech gamepad plus all the rewards listed in the JEWEL EDITION tier! This new reward tier is exclusive: it isn\u2019t automatically included in later tiers and doesn\u2019t contain previous tiers as normal. If the next tier refers to a previous tier, it will skip this tier.

The previous (non-exclusive) reward tier plus a DVD of the game in a jewel case (free shipping worldwide). This new tier is included in higher tiers as normal and has been established to automatically provide the $100 tier with a physical copy of the game.
The previous reward tier plus a printed version of the art book and a signed Project Giana poster with free shipping.

NEW: COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION - A backer-exclusive physical edition consisting of a DVD Digipack for Project Giana with all physical rewards from previous tiers PLUS two new physical rewards: a custom Giana USB drive containing all the digital rewards from previous tiers plus bonus goodies, and a Making of Project Giana DVD. (Free shipping worldwide.) This new reward tier is automatically included in all higher tiers as normal.

The previous reward tier plus a Giana backer T-shirt (final design will be shown in a future update) with free shipping and your name in the credits. Send us a digital picture of yourself, and you\u2019ll get it back with Giana herself kissing you on the cheek. Cute or punk \u2013 your choice. (Inappropriate pictures will need to be resubmitted.)

The previous reward tier plus a four-inch tall resin figurine consisting of Cute Giana, Punk Giana and a defeated owl. The figurine may take three to six months longer to ship. In such a case, it will be shipped separately, free of charge.
The previous reward tier plus original Project Giana concept art as a canvas print (signed or unsigned \u2013 your choice!) with free shipping.

The previous reward tier plus a large hand-crafted Pillowl plushie, monogrammed with your name, a "thank you" message and/or the text of your choice. Please specify whether you want a red, green or blue owl. (Free shipping.)

The previous reward tier plus a VIP invitation to our launch party, including behind the scenes insight into our game development and a signed Giana canvas made by our key Giana concept artist Pikomi himself, to be presented to you at the party. Includes a VIP airport shuttle from Frankfurt, Karlsruhe or Strasbourg and hotel cost for one night (travel costs not included).
The previous VIP reward tier plus\u2026 our only remaining copy of The Great Giana Sisters on Atari ST, to be presented to you in hushed tones at the launch party.
